_header: I Katherine of the court celestial
Subjects: Arthur, prince of Wales; Catherine of Aragon; pageant verses; occasional verse; Katherine of Alexandria, saint
_description: ‘The speche of Saynt Kateryn’ at the pageant celebrating the marriage of Prince Arthur to Princess Catharine — four stanzas rhyme royal

BLCottVitAXVI.First Lines: I kateryne of the Court Celestyallwhere as it Ioy & perdurable blisse…
BLCottVitAXVI.Last Lines: …Polycy to honour will you streite convoyhast you therefore god spede you on your wey
